const Vector4& rev::Light::getPosition ( ) const

Member Data Documentation

◆ m_attributes

Vector4 rev::Light::m_attributes
protected

Light attributes.

For directional lights: empty For point lights: constant, linear, and quadratic attenuations: attenuation = a1 + a2 * distance + a3 * distance^2 Default (1, 0, 0) is no attenuation (infinite light distance) For spot lights, cutoffs
